chapter.title: Clients
chapter.para: Three client implementations exists for Jolokia: Jmx4Perl, the Perl binding (the grandmother of all clients ;-), a Java library and a Javascript library. This reference describes the client bindings bundled with Jolokia. More JVM based client libraries are planned for inclusiong in Jolokia (e.g. Groovy, Scala or JRuby). Information about Jmx4Perl can be found elsewhere.
